Title: Seduced and Abandoned
Writer: Pietro Germi (story), Luciano Vincenzoni (story), Agenore Incrocci (screenplay), Furio Scarpelli (screenplay), Pietro Germi (screenplay), Luciano Vincenzoni (screenplay)
Actors: Stefania Sandrelli, Saro Urzì, Aldo Puglisi, Lando Buzzanca
Plot: Agnese, a 15-year-old Sicilian girl is seduced and impregnated by Peppino, her sister Matilde's fiancé. Soon Vincenzo, Agnese's father, discovers everything. He wants to force Peppino to marry the dishonored Agnese, but Peppino runs away and Vincenzo sends his son Antonio to kill him. At this point, Agnese goes to the police to try to stop events. They're all taken to court. But events can't be stopped, there's still time for a fake kidnapping. A happy end is still possible.
